|cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV800CB-70TIP; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = ESMT;M12L64164A-7TG; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = F0:7D:68 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = normal |serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = none |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = RG-10 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 03/2010 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *The ''D-Link DIR-100'' is a wired router with 1x WAN and 4x LAN ports. :D-link issued firmwares for the DIR-100 with different features: router, :802.1q VLAN management switch and "Triple Play Router" (router and IP media receiver). *The DIR-100 may be configured via HTTP, telnet or serial port using CLI :(Common Language Interface, example: http://pastie.org/pastes/2115436). * Documentation, firmwares and other may be found in [ftp://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Router/DIR-100/ D-Link FTP archive (RU)]. ====Description==== *OEM ''Alpha Networks'' model ''RG-10'' :"8RG10....2A1G" and a date code of ''1010'' (March 2010) is silkscreened on the board. * The SoC used is in a QFP package w/ 128 pins, a firmware string of :"Waveplus" would seem to indicate the device uses a [[WavePlus]] SoC.. :which I am assuming is WP3221 (there appears to be a datasheet of the chip [http://d1.amobbs.com/bbs_upload782111/files_16/ourdev_457680.pdf here]) * RAM chip is 1M x 16 Bit x 4 Banks, frequency 143 MHz, look at the [http://www.esmt.com.tw/DB/manager/upload/M12L64164A.pdf M12L64164A datasheet]. * Flash chip is 8 Mbit with an access time of 70 ns. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== TTL 3.3V serial port. Speed: 115200 baud, data bits: 8, parity: none, stop bit: 1, flow control: none. ====Serial Pinouts==== JP1 is the serial port. {| border="1" |1|| ||2||3||4 |} #RX #+3.3V #Ground #TX ==== Ports ==== {|cellpadding=2 !bgcolor=#c0c0c0|Label on case |bgcolor=#c0c0c0| LAN4 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0| LAN3 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0| LAN2 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0| LAN1 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0| WAN |- !bgcolor=#c0c0c0|Internal name |bgcolor=#c0c0c0 align=center| P0 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0 align=center| P1 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0 align=center| P2 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0 align=center| P3 |bgcolor=#c0c0c0 align=center| P4 |} ==== Boot log ==== Console output: 
WP3221 Rev 01

SDRAM TD: 03,  Bus: 16,  Bank: 02,  Row: 0c,  Col: 
08,  CS: 1
SDRAM Size: 0x00800000
Zz
WP3220 LOADER V1.5.26 20071030,D-Link
Ver  : 0.1.5.26
EthIf: 1
Run  : flash
BUF  : 10140000 SIZE=70000 SRC=a0010000
MAC  : F0:7D:68:5A:89:68 F0:7D:68:5A:89:69 00:DE:AD:BE:EF:FC 
VLAN : 0
HwVer: 0.1.2.3
SerNo: 12345678

IP/NM/GW: 192.168.0.1/255.255.255.0/192.168.0.67
TFTPS:FILE: 192.168.0.67:boot_sdtst_td3.img
NET BUF: b03ec000, 2KB x 16
progmac: 20:D9:20:D9:20:D9
if322x_init: done

Run  : flash  [Y] 
loading 0x7d690 bytes from a0010000 to 0x10140000
Goto 0x10140000!!!
Next does OS boot. ==Pictures==
